Posts.Content: Jan 14, 2010 03:59PM goldenlotus wrote: A week ago, I was in your shoes.  From reading these boards, and from the incredible advice and knowledge of these women, I came to learn that nothing is definite, until biopsy. Your doctor should not have told you that, believe me, I know exactly how you feel.  I have been terrified all week, that said, I had my biopsy yesterday and am now at peace with whatever the outcome will be.  Wait for the biopsy.......that is the hardest part, imo. (((hugs to you)))
